name: 莊欣慈
objective:
The objective of this course is to provide the students with abundant listening opportunities and reading strategies based on the most up-to-date materials in the popular culture. Materials for this course will be mainly focused on discussion of the cultures, thoughts and values of the English-speaking world. Students will be able to join activities which encompass group discussions of the materials provided.

本課程以流行文化下的產物, 如流行雜誌和最新的影集, 提供學生聽力與閱讀機會，以陪養學生獨立閱讀及使用適當英文表達之能力。教材以介紹英語地區文化、思想、及價值觀為主，以協助學生建立世界觀，並培養其批判思考能力。教學活動以團體與小組討論為主，以增加學生口說能力。
